com.netflix.spectator.atlas

Interface AtlasConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.netflix.spectator.api.RegistryConfig

    public interface AtlasConfig
extends com.netflix.spectator.api.RegistryConfig
    Configuration for Atlas registry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int batchSize()
      Returns the number of measurements per request to use for the backend.
      default Map<String,String> commonTags()
      Returns the common tags to apply to all metrics reported to Atlas.
      default Duration configRefreshFrequency()
      Returns the frequency for refreshing config settings from the LWC service.
      default String configUri()
      Returns the URI for the Atlas LWC endpoint to retrieve current subscriptions.
      default Duration connectTimeout()
      Returns the connection timeout for requests to the backend.
      default boolean enabled()
      Returns true if publishing to Atlas is enabled.
      default String evalUri()
      Returns the URI for the Atlas LWC endpoint to evaluate the data for a suscription.
      default boolean lwcEnabled()
      Returns true if streaming to Atlas LWC is enabled.
      default int numThreads()
      Returns the number of threads to use with the scheduler.
      default Duration readTimeout()
      Returns the read timeout for requests to the backend.
      default Duration step()
      Returns the step size (reporting frequency) to use.
      default String uri()
      Returns the URI for the Atlas backend.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.netflix.spectator.api.RegistryConfig

        gaugePollingFrequency, get, maxNumberOfMeters, propagateWarnings

    • Method Detail

      • step

        default Duration step()
        Returns the step size (reporting frequency) to use. The default is 1 minute.

      • enabled

        default boolean enabled()
        Returns true if publishing to Atlas is enabled. Default is true.

      • numThreads

        default int numThreads()
        Returns the number of threads to use with the scheduler. The default is 2 threads.

      • uri

        default String uri()
        Returns the URI for the Atlas backend. The default is http://localhost:7101/api/v1/publish.

      • lwcEnabled

        default boolean lwcEnabled()
        Returns true if streaming to Atlas LWC is enabled. Default is false.

      • configRefreshFrequency

        default Duration configRefreshFrequency()
        Returns the frequency for refreshing config settings from the LWC service.

      • configUri

        default String configUri()
        Returns the URI for the Atlas LWC endpoint to retrieve current subscriptions. The default is http://localhost:7101/lwc/api/v1/expressions/local-dev.

      • evalUri

        default String evalUri()
        Returns the URI for the Atlas LWC endpoint to evaluate the data for a suscription. The default is http://localhost:7101/lwc/api/v1/evaluate.

      • connectTimeout

        default Duration connectTimeout()
        Returns the connection timeout for requests to the backend. The default is 1 second.

      • readTimeout

        default Duration readTimeout()
        Returns the read timeout for requests to the backend. The default is 10 seconds.

      • batchSize

        default int batchSize()
        Returns the number of measurements per request to use for the backend. If more measurements are found, then multiple requests will be made. The default is 10,000.

      • commonTags

        default Map<String,String> commonTags()
        Returns the common tags to apply to all metrics reported to Atlas. The default is an empty map.
